other_tests.findings: A non-mobile shadowing gallstone is seen in the gallbladder neck measuring up to 2.3 cm in diameter. There is associated gallbladder distention. There is minimal gallbladder wall edema, less pronounced than on the recent CT. There is no associated pericholecystic fluid.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Less pronounced gallbladder wall edema than on the recent CT.
